info.name: Rapid Capsule API Collection v4.0
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Rapid Capsule Telemedicine Platform.

**Patient API**: https://api.rapidcapsule.com/api
**Specialist API**: https://api.rapidcapsule.com/api
**Admin API**: https://admin.rapidcapsule.com/admin-api

Total Endpoints: 700+

Created by Bassey Eyo (Founder & CTO)

item.name: Patient API
item.description: Endpoints for patient users - authentication, profile, appointments, health checkups, prescriptions, pharmacy, vitals, and wallet management.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Patient authentication - login, registration, OAuth, password reset, OTP verification, and 2FA

item.name: Profile
item.description: Patient profile management - view and update personal information, emergency contacts, dependants

item.name: Appointments
item.description: Book and manage appointments with specialists - search doctors, book consultations, reschedule, cancel, and video meetings

item.name: Health Checkup
item.description: AI-powered health assessment using Infermedica - symptom analysis, diagnosis, and Claude AI health summaries

body.raw: {"text": "I have a severe headache and fever for 2 days", "interview_token": "d1f5-a2b3-c4d5-e6f7"}

response.name: Success
response.body: {"success": true, "data": {"question": {"type": "single", "text": "Do you have a runny nose?"}, "conditions": [{"id": "c_87", "name": "Common cold", "probability": 0.72}], "should_stop": false}}

item.name: Vitals
item.description: Track and monitor vital signs - blood pressure, heart rate, temperature, weight, blood sugar, and oxygen levels

item.name: Prescriptions (Patient)
item.description: View and manage prescriptions - accept, decline, pay, and track prescription orders

item.name: Wallets
item.description: Patient wallet management - check balance, fund wallet, withdraw, and view transactions

item.name: Pharmacy Orders
item.description: Order medications - create orders, track delivery, manage addresses, and rate orders

item.name: Pharmacy (Browse)
item.description: Browse pharmacies and drugs - search medications, view categories, check interactions

item.name: Prescription Upload
item.description: Upload and manage external prescriptions for verification

item.name: Cards & Banks
item.description: Manage payment methods - add/remove cards and bank accounts

item.name: Subscriptions
item.description: Manage subscription plans

item.name: Referrals
item.description: Referral program - share codes, track referrals, earn rewards

item.name: Health Scores
item.description: Basic and advanced health score assessments

item.name: Get Relevant Checkups for Advanced Score
Claude Summary Credits
item.description: Manage Claude AI summary credits - purchase, transfer, check balance

item.name: Health Tips & Reminders
item.description: Personalized health tips and medication reminders

item.name: Misc
item.description: Other patient endpoints - specialist categories, languages, settings, rewards

item.name: Specialist API
item.description: Endpoints for healthcare specialists - appointments, patients, prescriptions, clinical notes, wallet, and dashboard.

item.name: Appointments
item.description: Specialist appointment management

item.name: Patients
item.description: View and manage patients

item.name: Prescriptions
item.description: Create and manage prescriptions

item.name: Clinical Notes
item.description: Manage clinical notes

item.name: Wallet
item.description: Specialist wallet management

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: Specialist dashboard

item.name: Admin API
item.description: Administrative endpoints for platform management - dashboard, users, finance, pharmacy, and compliance.

item.name: Auth
item.description: Admin authentication

item.name: Dashboard
item.description: Admin dashboard - metrics, trends, user management

item.description: Patient management

item.name: Compliance

item.name: Languages & Categories
item.description: Manage languages and categories
